mobilipy.poi_detection¶

Functions

assign_cell(latitude, longitude[, cell_size])

`

detect_home_work(legs, waypoints[, cell_size])

Detects home and work locations, tags them with 'Home' or 'Work' in the df

find_centroid(leg_index, legs, home_user, ...)

Tags legs as home or work if they're close enough to either Args: leg_index (int): index of the leg to be processed legs (list(???)): list of legs home_user ((latitude, longitude)): user's home location work_user ((latitude, longitude)): user's work location
